base_description: Gray, rectangular cabinet with multiple drawers.
part_description: Contains one large drawer and several smaller drawers arranged vertically. Supported by four legs, each positioned at the corners.
internal_interaction_description: The drawers slide in and out of the cabinet frame, with each drawer having a handle for easy access. The smaller drawers are stacked above the larger drawer, all fitting snugly within the main structure, ensuring stability and balance.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet can be placed against a wall or used as a standalone piece. It interacts with users by providing storage space, with drawers that can be pulled open to store or retrieve items. The flat top can hold decorative items or necessities.
